description: A tasty loaf that helps you get more fruit into your diet.
name: Fruit & Seed Soda Bread Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180°C. Lightly grease a 450g loaf tin. Place the dried fruit in a heatproof bowl, pour over 100ml boiling water, and set aside for 10 minutes.
Mix the flour, bicarbonate of soda, and seeds in a large bowl. Stir in the fruit in its water and the yoghurt.
Pour the mixture into the prepared tin and bake for 20-25 minutes or until firm. Allow to cool for 10 minutes before slicing.
